dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bill.CustomerBill
dataStructure.description:
A total amount due from a CustomerAccount for all products during the billing period.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerBill

child.name: billNo
child.description:
A unique identification number of a bill.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: billNo

child.name: billAmount
child.description:
A total customer bill amount due.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: billAmount

child.name: relationshipType
child.description:
Defines the type of connection between two CustomerAccounts.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: relationshipType
